thread.section_title: Hodges Badge Company, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hodges Badge Company, Inc | hodgesbadge.com
thread.title: KATHIE G. PARTY
thread.title_full: Hodges Badge Company, Inc reviewed by KATHIE G. PARTY

author: KATHIE G. PARTY
title: KATHIE G. PARTY
text:
Fantastic! Hodges Badge Company provided me with the best sashes for Mardi Gras! They were purple with big gold letters saying "Life Of The Party"
They were super easy to design, there are many designs and colors to choose from. I may have a sash for every occasion in my life from now on! Everything was delivered on time.
Hodges even did a special favor for me I had placed my order for 8 sashes and then found out we had an additional person joining in our group. I contacted Hodges to ask if I could add one more sash to my order. Because my order had not gone in to production yet....they were able to add a sash for my friend. Super sweet!!!
I highly recommend using Hodges and will call them again for all my sash needs! Very good company with super sweet employees!!!!
Cheers!!!!
